name: Gun-Scythe (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Gun-Scythe is a physics-based action game about wielding, you guessed it, a gun-scythe!

Carve through enemy robots with your blade, while using the recoil of your gun to launch yourself back and forth across the landscape!  How long can you protect the communications towers from the horde?

This is the fifth entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily updates!
